name: Totem Treasure 2 Slots Deluxe
description:
The award winning slot machine simulation Totem Treasure 2 comes to the iPad!

Totem bonuses abound and the mystical Golden Wolves may award you the biggest treasure of all - the Wampum Jackpot!

During normal play the Chief acts as a wildcard and substitutes for all symbols except scattered wolves.

3, 4 or 5 scattered wolves during normal play will award you 16, 24 or 40 free games and the Wolf Feature - where all pays are doubled.

Double up any win or play roulette to try and multiply a win up to 35 times your original pay.

This game is for entertainment purposes only. No real money can be won or lost.

The odds of winning in this simulation are not the same as in real slot machines. Real slot machines are designed to make you consistently lose.

You must be aged 18 (or 21 in some areas) to gamble.

Pokie Magic supports responsible gambling and appropriate parental supervision.
